messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: The great Fundoshi mystery
messages.msgSnippet: ... Sorry. You ll have to blame Barb for that one! He was like that when I got there! Honest! ^_^ -MissBehavin
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/26/2004 12:36:06 PM Eastern Standard Time, spiritus_saitou@... writes:

> MissB, did you already run off with one guys' fundoshi??? Honestly,
> you just can't be trusted ever to behave, ne? :-)
>
> This may have been mentioned previously, but are these guys
> wrestlers? Incredible muscles on those thighs!
>
> phil (who's surprisingly (or not so) without words)
>
> --- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> > Yes I'm an idiot and apparently the transfer of the fundoshi image
> did
> > not go through but I fixed it....However I might just
> tinker with
> it and
> > make it a tad more interesting in a couple days
> >
> > http://www.shinsengumihq.com/fundoshi.htm
> >
> > --
> > Barbara Sheridan
> > http://www.barbarasheridan.net

Sorry. You'll have to blame Barb for that one! He was like that when I got there! Honest! ^_^

-MissBehavin

messages.subject: Re: The great Fundoshi mystery
messages.msgSnippet: Whoa!  You know I thought the pic would be of -just- a fundoshi LOL! Wow, I wonder how the photographer felt about the guy who wanted to show off his tattoos
messages.messageBody:

Wow, I wonder how the photographer felt about the guy who wanted to
show off his tattoos :)
